DOC.brief_summary: This prospective open label single-arm , single-institution phase II clinical trial test efficacy neoadjuvant treatment IXO ( Irinotecan , Capecitabine [ Xeloda ] , Oxaliplatin ) follow chemoradiotherapy resection patient resectable non-metastatic primary rectal cancer stage cT3-T4 N0-N2 .
